alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Floyd (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Floyd and west central Bartow Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Lindale, or near Rome, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Rome and Shannon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
